extendedInfo.description: Download the Global Phone Tracker and transform your Android into a premium GPS tracking device.The Global Phone Tracker combines the robust GPS functionality of the Android with the most popular internet mapping tool to create a secure, permission-based system that allows people to see each other's current location as well follow their movements for the past 48 hours.ââââââââââââââââââFollow both Androids and iPhones!ââââââââââââââââââFeatures Include:âº Follow multiple people on a single mapâº See people's movements for the past 48 hoursâº Locate anyone with an accuracy of 30 feetâº Log locations from every 2 minutes to 60 minutesâº Attach photos to identify users on mapsâº Select time frame to see other's movementsâº Use satellite maps or street mapsâº Follow both iPhones and Android phonesââââââââââââââââââThe Global Phone Tracker is the perfect way to stay connected with friends, family and coworkers.  Now you can see where your contacts are in near-real time with your Android phone.ââââââââââââââââââUses include:âº Follow kids movements during the dayâº Know where family is at any timeâº Track employees  during work hoursâº Locate friendsâº Find lost or stolen phonesOther items:âº This version allows you to track 2 other Androids.  Upgrade to follow up to 10 people.âº To follow another person, they must use the Global Phone Tracker to grant you permission.âº IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, PLEASE EMAIL US AT: HELP@PhoneTracker.us.com
